| HistoryText             = Gypsy wizard [[Djordji Zindelo Hungaros (Earth-616)|Dizzy the Hun]] tried to prevent the [[Box of Khyscz]] to fall in the hands of [[Victor von Doom (Earth-616)|Victor von Doom]]; he identified some worthy teenagers and threw them the Box. The Box gave the teenagers and some of their friends superhuman powers, and then sent them in an inter-dimensional, inter-planetary trip to test their mettle.{{r|Marvel Comics Super Special Vol 1 1}}{{r|Kiss Classics Vol 1 1}}

[[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] met Kiss fans in the 70s.{{r|Deadpool Vol 5 13}}{{r|True Believers: The Groovy Deadpool Vol 1 1}}

During a period when [[Howard the Duck (Earth-791021)|Howard the Duck]]'s friend [[Winda Wester (Earth-616)|Winda Wester]] was suspected of being possessed by demons, Kiss manifested from Wester's mind.  [[Daimon Hellstrom (Earth-616)|Daimon Hellstrom]] was called in to investigate.  He determined that Wester was not possessed, but possibly had psychic abilities that reached out to a parallel reality and conjured Kiss.{{r|Howard the Duck Vol 1 12|13}} The home reality of the band's manifestation has not been definitively recorded.
